claim: Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).
explanation: Multi‐panel figure showing geometric mean fold rise in HAI antibody titers at 1 month and fold reduction at 6 months post‐vaccination, stratified by age group (18–44 and 45–64 years) for four quadrivalent vaccines: Fluzone IIV4, Fluarix IIV4, ccIIV4, and RIV4. Evidence: The figure compares RIV4 (orange symbols) against Fluarix IIV4 (black symbols), but does not explicitly identify RIV4 as Flublok. The image shows a head‐to‐head comparison of RIV4 versus Fluarix IIV4, but because RIV4 is not labeled as Flublok, the figure does not support the claim that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated against Fluarix in the pivotal trial. Note: It is not possible from the image alone to confirm that RIV4 corresponds to the brand name Flublok. No trial context or pivotal designation is provided.
